18: וְשָׂנֵ֤אתִֽי <sup>8130 </sup> <n>Yea I hated</n> אֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עֲמָלִ֔י <sup>5999 </sup> <n>all my labour</n> שֶׁאֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> עָמֵ֖ל <sup>6001 </sup> <n>which I had taken</n> תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>under the sun</n> שֶׁ֣אַנִּיחֶ֔נּוּ <sup>3240 </sup> <n>because I should leave</n> לָאָדָ֖ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>it unto the man</n> שֶׁיִּהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will come</n> אַחֲרָֽי׃ <sup>310 </sup> <n>that shall be after</n>

20: וְסַבּ֥וֹתִֽי <sup>5437 </sup> <n>Therefore I went about</n> אֲנִ֖י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> לְיַאֵ֣שׁ <sup>2976 </sup> <n>to despair</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לִבִּ֑י <sup>3820 </sup> <n>my heart</n> עַ֚ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>of</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הֶ֣עָמָ֔ל <sup>5999 </sup> <n>of all the labour</n> שֶׁעָמַ֖לְתִּי <sup>5998 </sup> <n>which I took</n> תַּ֥חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>under the sun</n>
21: כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יֵ֣שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>For there is</n> אָדָ֗ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>a man</n> שֶׁעֲמָל֛וֹ <sup>5999 </sup> <n>whose labour</n> בְּחָכְמָ֥ה <sup>2451 </sup> <n>[is] in wisdom</n> וּבְדַ֖עַת <sup>1847 </sup> <n>and in knowledge</n> וּבְכִשְׁר֑וֹן <sup>3788 </sup> <n>and in equity</n> וּלְאָדָ֞ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>yet to a man</n> שֶׁלֹּ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> עָֽמַל־ <sup>5998 </sup> <n>that hath not laboured</n> בּוֹ֙ יִתְּנֶ֣נּוּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>therein shall he leave</n> חֶלְק֔וֹ <sup>2506 </sup> <n>it [for] his portion</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>too</n> זֶ֥ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> הֶ֖בֶל <sup>1892 </sup> <n>This also [is] vanity</n> וְרָעָ֥ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> רַבָּֽה׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and a great</n>
22: כִּ֠י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> מֶֽה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>what</n> הֹוֶ֤ה <sup>1933 </sup> <n>For what hath</n> לָֽאָדָם֙ <sup>120 </sup> <n>man</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עֲמָל֔וֹ <sup>5999 </sup> <n>of all his labour</n> וּבְרַעְי֖וֹן <sup>7475 </sup> <n>and of the vexation</n> לִבּ֑וֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>of his heart</n> שֶׁה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>wherein</n> עָמֵ֖ל <sup>6001 </sup> <n>he hath laboured</n> תַּ֥חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>east side</n>
23: כִּ֧י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יָמָ֣יו <sup>3117 </sup> <n>For all his days</n> מַכְאֹבִ֗ים <sup>4341 </sup> <n>[are] sorrows</n> וָכַ֙עַס֙ <sup>3708 </sup> <n>grief</n> עִנְיָנ֔וֹ <sup>6045 </sup> <n>and his travail</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>even</n> בַּלַּ֖יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>in the night</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> שָׁכַ֣ב <sup>7901 </sup> <n>taketh not rest</n> לִבּ֑וֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>yea his heart</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>too</n> זֶ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> הֶ֥בֶל <sup>1892 </sup> <n>This is also vanity</n> הֽוּא׃ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n>
24: אֵֽין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>There</n> ט֤וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[There is] nothing better</n> בָּאָדָם֙ <sup>120 </sup> <n>for a man</n> שֶׁיֹּאכַ֣ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>[than] that he should eat</n> וְשָׁתָ֔ה <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drink</n> וְהֶרְאָ֧ה <sup>3318 </sup> <n>after</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַפְשׁ֛וֹ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and [that] he should make his soul</n> ט֖וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>good</n> בַּעֲמָל֑וֹ <sup>5999 </sup> <n>in his labour</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> זֹה֙ <sup>2090 </sup> <n>This</n> רָאִ֣יתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>enjoy</n> אָ֔נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>is from</n> מִיַּ֥ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>that it [was] from the hand</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> הִֽיא׃ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n>
25: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> מִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> יֹאכַ֛ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>For who can eat</n> וּמִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>and who</n> יָח֖וּשׁ <sup>2363 </sup> <n>or who else can hasten</n> ח֥וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>[hereunto] more</n> מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n>
26: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> לְאָדָם֙ <sup>120 </sup> <n>to a man</n> שֶׁטּ֣וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>that [is] good</n> לְפָנָ֔יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>in his sight</n> נָתַ֛ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>For [God] giveth</n> חָכְמָ֥ה <sup>2451 </sup> <n>wisdom</n> וְדַ֖עַת <sup>1847 </sup> <n>and knowledge</n> וְשִׂמְחָ֑ה <sup>8057 </sup> <n>and joy</n> וְלַחוֹטֶא֩ <sup>2398 </sup> <n>but to the sinner</n> נָתַ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>he giveth</n> עִנְיָ֜ן <sup>6045 </sup> <n>travail</n> לֶאֱס֣וֹף <sup>622 </sup> <n>to gather</n> וְלִכְנ֗וֹס <sup>3664 </sup> <n>and to heap up</n> לָתֵת֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>that he may give</n> לְטוֹב֙ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>to [him that is] good</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>too</n> זֶ֥ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> הֶ֖בֶל <sup>1892 </sup> <n>This also [is] vanity</n> וּרְע֥וּת <sup>7469 </sup> <n>and vexation</n> רֽוּחַ׃ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>of spirit</n>
